Wizoku

Sep 12, 2013

Hi!

 

My name is Nick Crosthwaite, and I'm a student at Columbia Business School. This year I started a tutoring company called Wizoku. As founder, I've been working to build a great website and connect with as many students and tutors as possible to build a great learning community. So right now we're in the process of expanding our tutor base and I'm reaching out to you because I thought your club members might be interested in applying.We're in the process of growing our online community and I'm reaching out to you because we are now expanding our reach to Princeton, and I thought your club members might be interested in applying to become one of our Campus Ambassadors.

Wizoku is an online learning community that uses innovative technology to connect students and tutors. Our Campus Ambassadors help us build this community. Effective Ambassadors do this by being active on campus, promoting us on social media, and reaching out to both students and tutors.

Wizoku Ambassadors are paid based on how many tutors and students they can bring to our site. Prospective Ambassadors can click here to apply and learn more about our Ambassador Program.

I'd really appreciate it if you could forward to this email to your club members. We've worked really hard on this site and we're excited about building our community to help as many students as possible. Please also check out our blog to learn more about us and what we do. Thanks so much for your time and please let me know if you have any questions!

Nick Crosthwaite

Co-Founder | Wizoku

718.791.5621 | nick@wizoku.com


Present.tv

Sep 12, 2013

http://www.present.tv/jobs/

Why join Present?

Present is an early stage startup that allows people to discover, create, and share live video with the world.  We're creating a way for people to see whatever they want to at any time; to feel empowered to see what's happening anywhere without the obstacle of distance.  Present is building the future of media broadcasting, leveling viewers and content creators, and we'd love for you to build with us.

We're a Tigerlabs portfolio company.  Working with us now, you'll participate largely in product development, customer engagement, and business development – every one of us does.  You'll attend speaker series and you'll meet leaders in NYC venture capital, and the startup ecosystem.  The daily grind at this stage is best described as making shit happen – if that's what you're into, you'll fit right in.

Our office is located in Princeton, NJ.

 

Our culture

- Nothing is difficult.

- "Fun": adjective a way to describe a situation in which you have to do something you're not at all familiar with.

- Be adaptable… startup life comes with occasional sharp turns and call-ins.

- See what needs to be done, and make great moves.

- Make mistakes and own them – just don't miss opportunities.  (Recognize, and internalize lessons from those mistakes!)

- Be curious, and question the status quo.

- 'It's impossible' sounds more like 'I have not looked into it.'

 

Benefits & perks

- Play a huge role as an early contributor to Presents' products.

- Play some fierce ping-pong with startups, awesome VCs, and international business leaders.

- Your mentors are leaders in the startup world.

- Contribute business, product, and technology.

 

Other benefits & perks

- Do you like dogs?  Me too!  All week there are dogs around the office

  - Don't worry they aren't in your space if you don't like them ;(

- Ripstick when your not coding.

- Coffee makes you smarter.  Enjoy nearby Small World Coffee.

- ...Yes, there is an Xbox.

If interested in applying, please send your resume and Github to dan@present.tv

CKM Advisors

Sep 12, 2013

Hello Princeton ACM,

My name is Marshall Louis Reaves (PhD '13), and I am a Consultant with CKM Advisors. CKM is a consulting firm headquartered in New York City that serves clients throughout the United States and around the world. We operate at the forefront of the development and application of analytics and create pioneering methods for strategy development and performance improvement. Our teams are comprised of highly talented individuals with deep expertise in data science and consulting. We are actively recruiting technically talented students to join our team as Consultants or Data Scientists, so I wanted to reach out to ACM because we believe that your members would be an excellent fit.

We are looking for top students with an interest in business and a passion for learning and developing new quantitative techniques to join us as Data Scientists. Students with a passion for analyzing complex business issues and developing recommendations based on rigorous analysis of large and complex data sets typically join our team as Consultants. We hire undergraduates, Masters students, and PhD candidates from a diverse array of academic backgrounds and encourage anyone with an interest in business, problem solving, or complex data analysis to consider the opportunities available at CKM.

We will be visiting Princeton on 9/24 and will have an informational session and interview workshop to further discuss the work that Consultants and Data Scientists do at our firm.  We would appreciate it if you could pass along this information to your listserve so that anyone interested is able to attend. I'll to reach out again as that date approaches.

If you have any questions or would like more information about our firm, please see our website at ckmadvisors.com, read our job postings on Princeton's job board, or email me and I am happy to talk to you further.Thank you very much for your consideration and your help.

Kind Regards,

Marshall Louis Reaves, PhD

Jane Street Info Session

Sep 12, 2013

Please join Jane Street for an informative look into the world of trading and technology. We will discuss both full time and summer internship opportunities.
Jane Street is a proprietary trading firm that operates around the clock and around the globe. We bring a deep understanding of markets, a scientific approach, and innovative technology to bear on the problem of trading profitably in the world’s highly competitive financial markets.
Founded in 2000, Jane Street employs over 340 people in New York, London and Hong Kong. Our entrepreneurial culture is driven by our talented team of traders and developers / researchers.  We are always recruiting top students and invite you to learn more about an internship or career at Jane Street.
Location: East Pyne 010
Time: 7-8pm
Date:Thursday, September 12th 
We invite all students (undergraduate, masters, doctoral) looking to utilize their quantitative and technical skills in a trading environment to attend.  Food and beverage will be served.
Please visit janestreet.com for additional information.

Zero Venture Partners

Sep 11, 2013

Dear ACM Group,

 

My name is Abeer Desai. I graduated from NYU Stern two years ago and have recently founded a company called Zero Venture Partners. One of the things we do is help startups articulate their value proposition on the internet, and establish thought leadership through activities such as blogging.

 

I want to connect passionate students with an opportunity to make $50/blog post writing about new developments and trends in their field of study. These blog posts will be written on behalf of a startup that is innovating in this same field.

 

This is a great chance for students to develop written and communication skills, add additional experience to their resume, and earn a solid side stream of money. Our program requires 1 blog post per week with each post being 600 - 900 words.

 

We currently have 1 open opportunity for a student studying in a field (or with appropriate experience) related to cloud technology and mobile app development.

 

If you are interested in learning more I would be happy to provide additional information.

 

Let me know if you would like to keep in touch about future companies we work with.

 

Best regards,

Abeer Desai

Founder, Zero Venture Partners
